. The bust, about 3,400 years old, is at the top of a "wish list" of five major artifacts exhibited abroad that Egypt wants returned as part of its cultural heritage. Egypt recognises and appreciates the care and effort undertaken by the government of Germany to preserve and display the painted limestone bust of Queen Nefertiti, Zahi Hawass said in a statement. But he asked that "this unique treasure be returned to the possession of its rightful owners, the Egyptian people."

It was incredible- the way they were each buried- individually, according to the word of Islamic tradition: their faces towards the Kaaba( Mekka), the libna( mud brick) under the head, the white shroud- complete to the smallest detail. the first time as a Piston, Allen Iverson scored 17 points and led Detroit to a 107-97 victory over the slumping Milwaukee Bucks. "With everything going on, I wanted to play well," Allen Iverson said. I just wanted to play well. Especially for my teammates because I let them down by not being here. Allen Iverson was benched by Pistons coach Michael Beasley Curry to begin the game, punishment for missing a mandatory team practice on Thanksgiving.
